name: Astro Packet Service
description:
In the vastness of space, you take control of a spaceship for a delivery service. Some cargo got dislodged from other cargo ships, and they're drifting in space. You're job is to find those missing cargo containers.

Use your tether to join them to your ship and fling them back into the station to be delivered. But beware of the dangers of space, they could hamper your mission success. Good luck!

Created during GMTK Game Jam 2021 with the theme Joined Together.
